Title: Вогонь і самоцвіт
Description:
What's this? A tinderbox? 

I've heard tell of these Arathi contraptions, but have never held one in my hands. It's smaller than I would have thought...

Upgraded, you say? Ha! We can do that. The next time we're Awakening the Machine, keep an eye out for an Awakened Cog. Oh, and keep your nose peeled for a Ringing Gemstone while you're out Snufflin', we could use that too! Gnawbles can probably point you in the right direction.
ObjectivesText: Acquire an Awakened Cog from Awakening the Machine and a Ringing Gemstone from Mole Snuffling.
CompletionText: Ти маєш ті речі для мене?
RewardText: You've got them! Cogs be praised and gears be ground, let's see what we can do with this magical little doodad of yours.
